data.message: The new messenger app is awful please give up on it

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Patrick. If there's anything we can do to make your Messenger experience more enjoyable, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1wRYwuz. -Sarah
Yeah just leave it alone and let people access messages through the Facebook app.
What Josh & Patrick have said. Kill the messenger app and move messages back into the main app! There is NO NEED for a separate app!

Agreed, Patrick. I understand that, FB, you are using it for marketing purposes, but the messenger app is ethically wrong, and I believe you know this. I was considering it, but then refused when I saw that I had to give up every single privacy right known to man. I suggest that everyone consider NOT using the Messenger app, as you are completely giving up your privacy rights.

Getting rid of the whole app would be useful. I have to keep taking up space on my phone with "useless" apps. There was nothing wrong with your in app messaging to begin with. But whats new, facebook only fixes what isn't broken.
Won't download your app :D Got half my friends on Whatsapp or they have my cell number. No need for a worthless, pointless app on my phone. Killing my battery ain't very nice!\
Get out of the pockets of Uncle Sam and Monsanto, FB.

If you're on android fones and happen to be rooted, use titanium backup or rom toolbox to freeze messenger...then clear data and cache for fb main app and you guys should be able to do ur chats and pms inside fb.
